duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with customers in-person, providing guidance and personalized financial planning.
Build and nurture relationships with an existing client base, offering complex financial solutions.
Present complex financial solutions to a knowledgeable client base, effectively building rapport and credibility.
Mentor and support customers in reaching their retirement goals through comprehensive investment solutions and retirement plans.
Effectively engage clients through personal interactions, reflecting interpersonal communication and relationship building skills.

education_certification.credential: FINRA Series 7 & 63 licensed; Series 65 or 66 licensed and appropriate state registrations OR ability to acquire series 65/66 upon hire.
Degree and/or other professional certifications are helpful; if you do not already have a CFP or degree, our Tuition Reimbursement program can help you obtain one.
Certified Financial Planner ® / CFP-® - Issuing Authority, Series 07 - FINRA, Series 63 - FINRA, Series 66 - FINRA
